BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 210259Z JUL
   BY M/V NPS VERITAS VIKING TOWING EIGHT
   3.5 MILE LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-51.87S 041-43.37W, 24-47.42S 041-49.32W,
   24-17.50S 042-02.38W, 24-17.05S 041-54.40W,
   24-29.33S 041-45.97W, 24-44.78S 041-22.57W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 210359Z JUL 12.
